languages.text: {n}Злоба с явным удовольствием произносит:{/n} "Теперь ты — Ревущ{mf|ий|ая}. Мясо".
{n}Malice looks visibly pleased when he says:{/n} "Now you are a Shrieker. Meat."

languages.text: {n}マリスは目に見えて嬉しそうな顔で言う。{/n}「これでお前はシュリーカーだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks visibly pleased when he says:{/n} "Now you are a Shrieker. Meat."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスは目に見えて嬉しそうな顔で言う。{/n}「これでお前はシュリーカーだ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}恶棍愉悦地开了口。{/n}“现在你也是尖啸者了，活畜。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks visibly pleased when he says:{/n} "Now you are a Shrieker. Meat."

languages.text: {n}Malicia parece encantado de decir:{/n} «Ahora eres un{mf||a} Aullador{mf||a}. Carne».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks visibly pleased when he says:{/n} "Now you are a Shrieker. Meat."

languages.text: {n}Tücke sagt sichtlich erfreut:{/n} "Jetzt seid Ihr ein Kreischer. Fleisch."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks visibly pleased when he says:{/n} "Now you are a Shrieker. Meat."

traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Malice vous répond d'un air positivement ravi :{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|un Hurleur|une Hurleuse}, maintenant. Viande. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks visibly pleased when he says:{/n} "Now you are a Shrieker. Meat."

languages.text: {n}Melanet, söyleyeceklerinden açıkça memnun görünüyor.{/n} "Artık bir Çığırtkansın. Etsin."
